ComicInfo.Title: Allies
ComicInfo.Summary: In part three of "Inherit the Wind," Bufkin continues his schemes to free Oz and its surroundings from the Nome King's oppressive rule. Meanwhile, at the North Wind's keep, the cubs continue to learn how to become winds â€“ but is it turning into a competition with a decidedly deadly edge?
